scripts.build-dev: npm run clean && cd node_modules/.bin && tsc -p ../../tsconfig.json
scripts.build-prod: npm run clean && cd node_modules/.bin && webpack --config ../../webpack/webpack.config.prod.js
scripts.run-dev: npm run build-dev && cd bin && node index.js
scripts.run-prod: npm run build-prod && cd bin && node index.js
